Body: i have a small question.i have installed in my farm house a SOHO router with a large omni antenna which covers about 30 acres of landeverybody on my farm have android phones. so i was looking for an app to install on all the phones so they become walkie-talkies.the only thing is that, i donot want to provide my employees with internet access (it is quite costly and i have to pay per GB). my router will provide them with static IP leases without internet access.basically i need something like this http://ipmsg.org/index.html.en only for voice and for android.please help.
